MailTemp.Subject: GE Fingerprints | Registration/Enrollment code
MailTemp.Body:
Greetings,
You have been requested to register under the GE Fingerprints System!
Please follow these steps to start your registration process:
Click this URL to get started: $Link$ (If you are not able to click on this link, just copy and paste the URL into the browser).
Enter your Enrollment Code (Enrollment code is listed below), Email, Password, First and Last Name.
Enrollment Code: $Code$
Once you submit your request, you will receive a notification that registration was successful and an Email Confirmation has been sent. If you do not see the successful notification or an email has not been sent within ten minutes, please contact support at support@gefingerprints.com.
Thank You,
GE Fingerprints Team
